text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha a l laoh doeng nouv rypel del puokke ban dek . pheap athrkambang nei mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei chea kammosetthi robsa trong . trong kheunh ning lyy nouv avei teangoasa . puokke kmean anak keapear krawpi trong laey . haey trong min yk anaknea mneak mk chaulruom chea daikou knong kar sa me r ch bt b nhnh tde robsa trong laey
